籤詩版本二:
Njengokuhudula ingwe entabeni ende, ukulwa nokuncintisana ukuze kunqamuke amakhaza
Ungalindele uvele wenze into enhle kumele uzigcine uphephile igama elithi ukudonsa ingwe lisho ukugona ingwe.
詩意:
Le hexagram ifana nokubamba (ukudonsa) ingwe ukuwela intaba.
Konke kuyingozi futhi kuyethusa.
解曰: Ingozi iyingozi. Kunezithiyo ezizayo. Uma ucela iseluleko. Kungumsebenzi onzima ngempela.
籤詩故事一:
◇Wu Yuan ushiye eZhaoguan ebusuku (Wu Zixu wadlula eZhaoguan)
U-Wu Zixu wayengowokuzalwa e-Chu ngesikhathi saseNtwasahlobo nesekwindla. Ngaleso sikhathi, iNkosi uPing of Chu yayifuna ukumzingela. Inkosi u-Ping of Chu yanikeza umklomelo ngokuboshwa kukaWu Zixu, futhi isithombe sakhe sadwetshwa sabekwa emasangweni edolobha kuso sonke iSifundazwe SaseChu, futhi yayala izikhulu ukuthi ziqinise uphenyo. Ngenkathi u-Wu Zixu ebalekela e-Zhaoguan, umngcele ophakathi kwe-Wu ne-Chu, izikhulu zase-Zhaoguan zabhekisisa kakhulu. Wayekhathazeke kakhulu kangangokuthi wayengakwazi ukulala ubusuku obuningana obulandelanayo, ngisho nezinwele zakhe zaba mpunga ngenxa yokukhathazeka. Ngenhlanhla, ngahlangana nendoda okuthiwa u-Dong Gao Gong, eyazwelana nosizi lwakhe futhi yamyisa ekhaya ukuze ayocasha. U-Duke Dong Gao wayenomngane owayefana no-Wu Zixu, ngakho u-Duke Dong Gao wamcela ukuthi aphumelele isivivinyo ngokuzenza u-Wu Zixu. Onogada babamba iWu Zixu mbumbulu, kodwa iWu Zixu yangempela ayizange ibonwe yizikhulu ngoba izinwele zakhe zazimhlophe zonke, ngakho zamdedela ukuba adlule. Kamuva, wabaleka ngokuphepha waya esifundeni saseWu.
(Ukushintsha uWu Zixu ngomngane ofana naye, naye onezinwele ezimpunga, "isandla somlingo" sale ndaba)
聖意: Thandazela umuzi wakho nomuzi wakho ukuthi uzivikele, qaphela ukufuna ingcebo, qaphela ekuhwebeni, ukuma ekuhwebeni, izinkinga zomshado
古人: UWu Yuan ushiye eZhaoguan ebusuku (Wu Zixu wadlula eZhaoguan)
